name: Fisnik Canaj
summary: Front‑end Developer with 8+ years of experience specialising in JavaScript and Angular frameworks. Proficient in designing efficient architectures and implementing performance optimisations. Skilled in creating visually appealing and user‑friendly applications. Collaborative, delivery‑focused, and committed to staying current with modern web technologies.
about: Beyond my professional roles, I’ve built side projects like a WordPress news portal with custom automation scripts, a Stripe‑backed gadget rental app, and a 3D chess DApp concept. One of my favourite achievements was helping deliver a Volvo online car‑sales project under a tight deadline, then contributing to a major rewrite of CSGORoll using modern Angular and state management.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Worked on Hypedrop and CSGORoll using Angular 16/17, GraphQL/Apollo, TypeScript, NgRx and RxJS.
Designed and shipped a Favourites box feature to increase engagement and retention.
Resolved defects and optimised performance and stability across betting flows.
Collaborated cross‑functionally to deliver high‑quality features with strong UI/UX.

experience.title: Frontend/Angular Developer
bullets: Volvo car purchase module enabling online sales for regional markets.
Cisco Health Care enhancements and Cypress test coverage with partner Avodaq.
Optimised Service Plan project across front‑ and back‑end; migrated Angular 13→15 in NX.
Maintained brand consistency and improved page performance at scale.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Delivered features prioritising UX and responsiveness across devices.
Built reusable components and leveraged Vue.js, JavaScript, Sass, Webpack and PHP/Laravel.

bullets: Angular booking application with lazy loading and routing.
Complex forms integrated with APIs for E‑Dea; identified automation opportunities.

bullets: Built UI components, filtering and charting; improved app performance.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Completed coding workshop and shipped projects using HTML, CSS/Bootstrap and PHP.

bullets: UI development with JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML and CSS.

bullets: Built portfolios and projects while learning Angular, React, Vue and Python; deepened DSA skills.
